channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
when I run server I get this [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\cfg\prices.txt (The system cannot find file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.Scanner.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:308) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62)
[/code]
I did add prices.txt

item.title: Help please

item.description:

when I run server I get this [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\cfg\prices.txt (The system cannot find
file specified)
